Protocols/UITestScreenInitialisableProto.name: UITestScreenInitialisableProtocol
Protocols/UITestScreenInitialisableProto.abstract: Protocol to allow us to use generics for function that provides new instance of screen objects

Functions.html#/s:20iOSKonbiniAutomation.name: WaitFor(element:to:atMost:file:line:)

Functions.html#/s:20iOSKonbiniAutomation.abstract: Appends text into element by clearing it first and then entering original text + appended text.

Functions.html#/s:20iOSKonbiniAutomation.abstract: Swipes in chosen direction on element until target element becomes hittable

Functions.html#/s:20iOSKonbiniAutomation.abstract: Perform drag action from dragged element to destination element

Functions.html#/s:20iOSKonbiniAutomation.abstract: Perform swipe left action on element.

Functions.html#/s:20iOSKonbiniAutomation.name: Press(on:forDuration:file:line:)

Functions.html#/s:20iOSKonbiniAutomation.name: Rotate(on:rotation:withVelocity:file:line:)
Functions.html#/s:20iOSKonbiniAutomation.abstract: Performs rotation gesture with two touches on element.

Functions.html#/s:20iOSKonbiniAutomation.name: ToggleSwitch(switch:file:line:)
Functions.html#/s:20iOSKonbiniAutomation.abstract: Attempts to toggle switch element by tapping on it.

Functions.html#/s:20iOSKonbiniAutomation.abstract: Tries to navigate from currently active screen to target one
